document.full_text: a pakistani teenager wanted in the united states on charges of financing and supporting the pakistani taliban denied on sunday any connection with the militants, saying his family was only helping victims of war.
document.title: pakistani charged in u.s. over taliban support denies link
lines_and_colors: a pakistani teenager wanted in the united states on charges of financing and supporting the pakistani taliban denied on sunday any connection with the militants, saying his family was only helping victims of war.
